p:
The infection threshold β
c of the ODE model can be derived as: β
c = γ, i.e., as long as the infectivity parameter β is greater than the rate of recovery γ, the virus can cause sustained infection. Note the expression is independent of parameter φ, i.e., the parameter for the impact of IFN on protecting target cells. The infection threshold β
c of the network with two ER graphs and how it depends on the similarity between the two layers are derived previously in Huang et al. ( 20).
